name: Emerald Orb
description: A catalyst carved out of the hard jade from Jueyun Karst north of Liyue. Small, light, and durable, it is known more colloquially as the "jade ball."

passiveDescription.0: Upon causing a Vaporize, Electro-Charged, Frozen, Bloom, or a Hydro-infused Swirl reaction, increases ATK by <cryo>20%</cryo> for 12s.
passiveDescription.1: Upon causing a Vaporize, Electro-Charged, Frozen, Bloom, or a Hydro-infused Swirl reaction, increases ATK by <cryo>25%</cryo> for 12s.
passiveDescription.2: Upon causing a Vaporize, Electro-Charged, Frozen, Bloom, or a Hydro-infused Swirl reaction, increases ATK by <cryo>30%</cryo> for 12s.
passiveDescription.3: Upon causing a Vaporize, Electro-Charged, Frozen, Bloom, or a Hydro-infused Swirl reaction, increases ATK by <cryo>35%</cryo> for 12s.
passiveDescription.4: Upon causing a Vaporize, Electro-Charged, Frozen, Bloom, or a Hydro-infused Swirl reaction, increases ATK by <cryo>40%</cryo> for 12s.
